duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the Laboratory Investigations (Simple RAACs and Complex Laboratory Investigation Reports) and Manufacturing Investigations (Simple Events and Complex Quality Assurance Records)
Review and approve documentation associated with Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP), method validation, investigation of change controls, and technical reports.
Collaborate with site functional areas and customers to support site goals, objectives, and timelines.
Manage multiple projects and ongoing work activities of moderate complexity within the division typically involving cross-functional representatives.

education_certification.credential: B.S. degree +3 years of experience within GMP and/or Biopharma industry
